exes.name: Ron 'Burger' Livingston
exes.flaws: Sucked at communication, broke up with me via post it, was kind of boring in office space.

exes.name: C3P0
exes.flaws: Has no emotion, kind of annoying, lacking a human quality.

exes.name: Batman
exes.flaws: Struggled with his vigilante complex, always sounded like he had a frog in his throat, wore too much black.

exes.name: Einstein
exes.flaws: Always thought he knew everything, never combed his hair, could never get past talking about relativity.

exes.name: Cosmo Kramer
exes.flaws: When he smoked he looked hideous, he shaved with butter, he was a bit of a hipster doofus.

exes.name: Han Solo
exes.flaws: Too cocky, too good looking for his own good, when I said I love you he said 'I know'.
